org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts.axis

Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts.axis.Axis
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValueAxis

    public abstract class Axis
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class containing implementations of functions common for all axis types.
    Author:
    siposp

      Returns true if the caption for this axis is visible or false for invisible caption
      static Axis join(Axis axis1, Axis axis2)
      Joins the two given axises to one The new axis has minimum and maximum value from both axis and the other properties from the first one (color,caption)

        public Axis()

    • Method Detail

      • getValuePos

        public abstract double getValuePos(double value)
        Returns the position of the given value relative to this axis
        Parameters:
        value - the value, which position we want to determine
        Returns:
        the position expressed as a value from 0.0 to 1.0 where 0.0 corresponds to the minimal value on this axis and 1.0 to the maximum

      • getTickCount

        public abstract int getTickCount()

      • getTickString

        public abstract java.lang.String getTickString(int tick)

      • getTickPosition

        public abstract double getTickPosition(int tick)
        Returns the position of the tick on the axis
        Parameters:
        tick - the index of the tick
        Returns:
        0.0 for the tick, which equals to minimum and 1.0 for the tick, that equals to maximum

      • getAxisColor

        public java.awt.Color getAxisColor()
        Retuns the color of the axis
        Returns:
        Color object

      • setAxisColor

        public void setAxisColor(java.awt.Color axisColor)
        Sets the new color for the axis
        Parameters:
        axisColor - Color object of the new color

      • getCaption

        public java.lang.String getCaption()
        Returns the caption for the axis
        Returns:
        axis' caption

      • setCaption

        public void setCaption(java.lang.String caption)
        Sets the caption for the axis
        Parameters:
        caption - the new caption

      • isCaptionVisible

        public boolean isCaptionVisible()
        Returns true if the caption for this axis is visible or false for invisible caption
        Returns:
        true for visible caption

      • setCaptionVisible

        public void setCaptionVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets the caption visibility
        Parameters:
        visible - true for visible caption

      • join

        public static Axis join(Axis axis1,
        Axis axis2)
                 throws AxisNotJoinableException
        Joins the two given axises to one The new axis has minimum and maximum value from both axis and the other properties from the first one (color,caption)
        Throws:
        AxisNotJoinableException
